document.full_text: with a correct spelling of 'g-l-a-d-i-o-l-u-s,' mr. neuhauser won the first national spelling bee in 1925.
document.title: frank neuhauser, a speller's speller, dies at 97
lines_and_colors: with a correct spelling of 'g-l-a-d-i-o-l-u-s,' mr. neuhauser won the first national spelling bee in 1925.
